sourcesContent: {allHoldings.map((stock, index) => { const qty = Number(stock.qty) || 0; const avg = Number(stock.avg) || 0; const price = Number(stock.price) || 0; const curValue = price * qty; const profitLoss = curValue - avg * qty; const isProfit = profitLoss >= 0; const profClass = isProfit ? "profit" : "loss"; // Handle percentage values properly const netChange = stock.net ? parseFloat(stock.net.replace("%", "")) || 0 : 0; const dayChange = stock.day ? parseFloat(stock.day.replace("%", "")) || 0 : 0; return ( {stock.name} {qty} {avg.toFixed(2)} {price.toFixed(2)} {curValue.toFixed(2)} {profitLoss.toFixed(2)} = 0 ? "profit" : "loss"}> {netChange.toFixed(2)}% = 0 ? "profit" : "loss"}> {dayChange.toFixed(2)}% ); })}
